name: PKContactField
desc: The fields that describe a contact.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Create a contact field given the raw value.

items.name: static let emailAddress: PKContactField
items.desc: A constant that indicates a contact's email address.

items.name: static let name: PKContactField
items.desc: A constant that indicates a contact's name.

items.name: static let phoneNumber: PKContactField
items.desc: A constant that indicates a contact's telephone number.

items.name: static let phoneticName: PKContactField
items.desc: A constant that indicates a contact's phonetic name.

items.name: static let postalAddress: PKContactField
items.desc: A constant that indicates a contact's postal address.
